Heya!

I'm Yazhou — a UX/UI designer based in Dublin, part-time doodler, full-time cat enthusiast. 🐾
This is where I put my favorite creative projects — hope they make you smile like they did for me. ✨

🐾 Let's start with a meowgical fact for today!

🐱 You check your cats pulse on the inside of the back thigh, where the leg joins to the body. Normal for cats: 110-170 beats per minute.

🧰 And here are the tools I reach for (almost) daily

🎨 Design
Figma, Whimsical, Adobe PS, Adobe Il Where messy ideas get shaped into clean interfaces.
📦 UI Kits
Bootstrap, Material UI I use these in Figma to match real-world dev systems.
💻 Code
HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Astro, Bootstrap 5 Just enough front-end to bring this site to life :)
